heroes.name: Smith
heroes.notes: Starting hero. Growth hero for Iron resources.
heroes.best_use: Iron gathering only. Replace in combat with any Epic or Legendary infantry.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Smith swings his hammer with tremendous force, dealing Attack x 150-210% damage to a single enemy.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Smith's determination increases his Defense by 5-15% for 4 seconds.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Increases Iron Gathering Speed by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Skilled metalwork increases Iron Gathering Capacity by 5-25%.

heroes.name: Eugene
heroes.notes: Growth hero for Wood resources.
heroes.best_use: Wood gathering only. Replace in combat with Sergey or any Legendary infantry.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Eugene spins with his axe, dealing Attack x 100-140% damage to nearby enemies.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: A powerful downward chop deals Attack x 180-250% damage to a single target.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Increases Wood Gathering Speed by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Expert forestry increases Wood Gathering Capacity by 5-25%.

heroes.name: Charlie
heroes.notes: Growth hero for Coal resources.
heroes.best_use: Coal gathering only. Replace in combat with Patrick or any Legendary lancer.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Charlie fires explosive rounds dealing Attack x 120-170% damage to enemies in a small area.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Creates an explosion dealing Attack x 150-210% AoE damage and pushing back enemies.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Increases Coal Gathering Speed by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Mining expertise increases Coal Gathering Capacity by 5-25%.

heroes.name: Cloris
heroes.notes: Growth hero for Meat resources. Best hunter on the Icefield.
heroes.best_use: Meat gathering only. Replace in combat with Bahiti or any Legendary marksman.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Cloris fires a volley of arrows, dealing Attack x 80-110% damage to multiple enemies in an area.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: A precision shot deals Attack x 200-280% damage to a single target with increased critical chance.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Increases Meat Gathering Speed by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Expert tracking increases Meat Gathering Capacity by 5-25%.

heroes.name: Sergey
heroes.notes: Best garrison joiner in the game. His expedition skill reduces damage taken by all troops.
heroes.best_use: BEST GARRISON JOINER. Put in leftmost slot when reinforcing garrisons. Don't use for attack rallies.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Deals damage to a single enemy and increases own defense.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Increases defense of all allied troops in battle.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Chance to block incoming attacks, reducing damage taken.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Reduces damage taken by ALL troops (including other classes) by up to 20%. Best garrison joiner skill in the game.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Reduces enemy attack power during combat.

heroes.name: Gina
heroes.notes: Reduces stamina cost by 20%. Great for Beast Hunting and Polar Terrors.
heroes.best_use: Use for Beast Hunting (stamina savings). Replace in combat with Philly in Gen 2.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Deals Attack x 210-290% damage to target and Attack x 70-98% damage to nearby enemies.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Increases Attack Speed by 10-30%.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Increases Crit Rate by 7-20%.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Reduces Stamina cost by 10-20%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Boosts Wilderness March Speed by 20-100%.

heroes.name: Bahiti
heroes.notes: Best Epic marksman. Easy to get shards from Epic Recruitment and Intel Missions.
heroes.best_use: Early game marksman. Great for F2P. Solid until you get Gen 2+ legendary marksmen.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Bahiti targets enemy weak points with devastating precision, dealing Attack x 400-560% damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Bahiti gains +10-30% Attack Speed from wilderness survival experience.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Bahiti deals 10-30% extra damage with all attacks.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Reduces damage taken by 4-20% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Bahiti's battlefield instinct grants all troops' attack a 50% chance of increasing damage dealt by 10-50%.

heroes.name: Seo-yoon
heroes.notes: Growth hero with attack and healing buffs. Rally joiner with 25% attack boost for all troops.
heroes.best_use: Early rally joiner with Rallying Beat (+25% troop attack). Good for infirmary healing speed. Replace in combat when better options available.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Seo-yoon plays an inspiring melody, increasing all heroes' Attack by 5-15% for 4s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Strikes with her drum dealing Attack x 180-250% damage to a single target.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Rhythmic beats increase Attack Speed by 10-30% for all heroes for 3s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Inspiring drums increase Attack by 5-25% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Ancient healing arts increase Infirmary Healing Speed by 10-50%.

heroes.name: Jasser
heroes.notes: Growth hero with rally damage boost and research speed. Tactical Genius gives 25% damage to all troops.
heroes.best_use: Early rally joiner/leader with Tactical Genius (+25% troop damage). Also boosts Research Speed by 15%. One of three Epic heroes with 25% rally buff.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Fires three arrows in rapid succession, dealing Attack x 80-110% damage each.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Continuous arrow fire deals Attack x 40-55% damage to enemies in a line every 0.5s for 2s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Innate accuracy increases Crit Rate by 5-15%.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Brilliant tactics increase Damage Dealt by 5-25% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Military knowledge increases Research Speed by 3-15%.

heroes.name: Patrick
heroes.notes: Solid early lancer with healing and tankiness. Great F2P hero.
heroes.best_use: Best Epic lancer. Heals troops and boosts survivability. Use until Molly or Flint are leveled.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Patrick prepares a lavish feast, restoring Health by Attack x 200-280% to all troops and increasing Attack by 5-7% for 4s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Patrick's protective blubber reduces damage taken by 10-30%.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Patrick's regular snacking restores Health equal to Attack x 50-70% every 5s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Patrick's culinary masterpieces invigorate our troops, increasing Health by 5-25% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Patrick's gourmet meals motivate and unleash the potential of our soldiers, increasing Attack by 5-25% for all troops.

heroes.name: Ling Xue
heroes.notes: Development hero with attack boosts and training speed. Good defensive buffs when low health.
heroes.best_use: Alternative to Patrick. Training Speed buff useful for building troops. Reduces enemy attack in expedition.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Ling Xue spins with her spear creating a hurricane, dealing Attack x 160-224% AoE damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Wind-powered strikes increase Attack Speed by 15-45% for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: When below 30% Health, gains 20-60% Defense and 10-30% Attack.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Debilitating attacks reduce enemy Attack by 4-20%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Discipline increases Training Speed by 5-25%.

heroes.name: Lumak Bokan
heroes.notes: Warrior of Emerald Valley. Guerrilla tactics reduce enemy damage. Excellent hunting march speed.
heroes.best_use: BEST FOR HUNTING. 100% hunting march speed at max level. Tactical Deception reduces enemy damage by 20%. Great for Beast Hunting and Polar Terrors.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Lumak stomps the ground causing an earthquake, dealing Attack x 180-252% AoE damage and stunning enemies for 1s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Jungle drums boost Attack by 8-24% for all heroes for 4s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Natural agility grants 5-15% dodge chance and 10-30% movement speed.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Guerrilla tactics reduce enemy Damage Dealt by 4-20%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Jungle expertise increases Hunting March Speed by 20-100%.

heroes.name: Jeronimo
heroes.notes: Top tier infantry. 25% troop damage, 25% attack boost. Essential for rallies and SvS.
heroes.best_use: PRIORITY INVESTMENT. Best rally leader. Essential for SvS. Use in every combat situation. Never stop investing.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Jeronimo launches enemies in the target area into the air, following up with three slashes, each dealing Attack x 160-224% damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Each of Jeronimo's attacks releases sword energy, dealing Attack x 15-23% damage to enemies in a rectangular area straight ahead.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Jeronimo is a master at pressing advantages, gaining a +16-48% Attack boost over 50% Health.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Jeronimo delivers a rousing rally speech ahead of the battle, increasing damage dealt by +5-25% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Jeronimo imparts the secrets of swordsmanship, increasing attack by +5-25% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Jeronimo's sword arts empower soldiers to seize battle opportunities, increasing Damage Dealt by 6-30% for all troops for 2 turns every 4 turns.
heroes.rally_joiner_skill: Infantry ATK multiplier - boosts all rally damage

heroes.name: Natalia
heroes.notes: Solid early game infantry. Remains useful across multiple generations.
heroes.best_use: Strong early infantry tank. Good for exploration and as 2nd infantry in rallies. Worth leveling.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Natalia's bear violently smashes the ground, knocking back enemies in range and stunning them for 1s while dealing 160-224% Attack damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: A direct attack dealing 150-210% Attack damage to a single target.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Passive: 10% chance to gain +4-12% Attack boost (stacking up to 5 times) for 3 seconds when taking damage.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Grants troops a 40% chance to reduce all damage taken by 10-50%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Passive buff increasing Attack by 5-25% for all troops under her command.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Boosts damage output by 5-25% for all troops through Natalia's connection with nature.

heroes.name: Molly
heroes.notes: Good lancer for early game exploration. AoE damage with freeze.
heroes.best_use: Early exploration lancer. Good until Flint or Logan. Lower SvS priority.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Molly launches a Super Snowball which deals Attack x 180-252% AoE damage and freezes enemies for 1.5s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Molly ambushes the enemy with great camouflage skills, dealing Attack x 150-210% damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Molly loves a challenge, gaining +20-60% Attack Speed under 50% Health.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Molly creates an avalanche that clouds enemy sights, granting a 40% chance of reducing all troops' Damage Taken by 10-50%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Molly excels in snowy terrains, granting all troops' attack a 50% chance of increasing damage dealt by 10-50%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Hell hath no fury like an angry Molly. Increasing damage dealt by +5-25%.

heroes.name: Zinman
heroes.notes: Growth hero - 15% building cost reduction and faster upgrades. Weak in combat.
heroes.best_use: City development only. Use Building Speed and Bastionist skills. Replace in combat.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Zinman fires a barrage of nails dealing Attack x 60-85% damage per hit for 3 hits.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: When health drops below 50%, Zinman gains 10-30% Attack Speed and 5-15% Defense.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Zinman's expertise grants 10-30% increased Defense to all nearby allied troops for 4s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Increases Construction Speed by 3-15% for all buildings.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Reduces Building Upgrade Costs by 3-15%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Zinman's defensive tactics reduce Garrison Damage Taken by 4-20%.

heroes.name: Flint
heroes.notes: Strong lancer. Good investment to strengthen your team.
heroes.best_use: Top Gen 2 lancer. Great for rallies and SvS. Worth heavy investment until Gordon.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Flint's fire-breathing attack deals Attack damage every 0.5s and amplifies damage taken by the target by 10-30% for 2 seconds.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: When health drops below 50%, Flint recovers 20-40% of his max Health. Triggers once per battle.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Boosts your heroes' Attack Speed by 3-7% through Flint's warm flames.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Increases infantry's Damage Dealt by 20-100% based on skill level.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Raises Attack by 5-25% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Elevates all troops' Lethality by 5-25% through Flint's destructive flames.

heroes.name: Philly
heroes.notes: Best healer in the game. Essential for exploration. Must-have.
heroes.best_use: MUST HAVE HEALER. Essential for all exploration content. Max her healing skills first. Lower SvS priority but critical for PvE.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Philly's advanced medical training immediately restores Health equal to Attack x 200-280% to all friendly heroes.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: A master of first aid, Philly immediately restores Health equal to Attack x 100-140% to the weakest friendly hero.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Philly poisons the target, disabling the enemy for 1s while dealing Attack x 140-196% damage.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Philly's secret remedy strengthens the soldiers, increasing Attack by 3-15% and Defense by 2-10% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Philly's uses her secret tonic to enhance the warriors' strength, granting all troops' attack a 25% chance of dealing +120-200% damage.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Philly's special shot improves troops' focus, granting a 40% chance of reducing all troops' Damage Taken by 10-50%.

heroes.name: Alonso
heroes.notes: Great infantry with AOE damage and healing.
heroes.best_use: Excellent infantry with self-sustain. Great for exploration and solid in SvS. Pairs well with Jeronimo.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Alonso casts a wide net over the target area, dealing Attack x 200-280% AoE Damage and immobilizing enemies for 1.5s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Alonso shoots a harpoon with tsunami-like force at a target, dealing Attack x 50-70% AoE Damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Alonso's heavy harpoon stuns targets for 0.2-0.5s after every 8-5 strikes.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Increases troop lethality with a 40% chance, granting 10-50% boost per trigger.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Grants a 20% chance to reduce enemy damage by 10-50% for all hostile troops for two turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Provides troops a 50% chance to deal 10-50% additional damage through toxic coatings.

heroes.name: Logan
heroes.notes: Top defender. Essential for garrisons and defense.
heroes.best_use: BEST DEFENDER. Essential for garrison defense in SvS. Priority for defensive players. Get Fists of Steel gear.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Logan unleashes devastating punches dealing Attack x 250-350% damage to nearby enemies.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Logan's powered armor increases Defense by 15-35% and Health by 10-30%.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: A wind-powered punch deals Attack x 300-420% damage and pushes enemies back.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Increases Lancer Damage Dealt by 10-50% with fearsome power.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Reduces enemy Attack by 4-20% through sheer intimidation.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Inspiring leadership increases all troops' Defense by 4-20%.

heroes.name: Mia
heroes.notes: Higher damage and better team scaling than earlier marksmen.
heroes.best_use: Best Gen 3 marksman. Strong in exploration and decent in SvS. Good team damage buffs.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Mia throws a tarot card at enemies, dealing Attack x 270-378% damage and can either reduce target Attack by 20% for 2s or stun for 1.5s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Mia curses an enemy, dealing fluctuating damage (5% to 600% of Attack x 50-70% base value).
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Mia protects the hero with lowest remaining Health and restores Health (5% to 400% of Attack x 100-140% base value).
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Grants all troops' attack a 50% chance of cursing targets, increasing their damage taken by 10-50%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Mia provides troops with a 50% chance of dealing 10-50% additional damage.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Mia foresees potential dangers before battle, granting a 40% chance of reducing damage taken by 10-50% for all troops.

heroes.name: Greg
heroes.how_to_obtain: Hall of Heroes, King of Icefield, State of Power, Hero's Mission
heroes.notes: Crowd-control marksman with stuns and AoE damage. Sword of Justice gives 40% damage boost to all troops.
heroes.best_use: Best for Beast Hunting and Frostfire Mine. Righteous Wind stuns enemies. Fair Judgment increases enemy damage taken by 30%.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Summons a cage from the sky, dealing Attack x 160-224% damage to enemies within range and stunning them for 2s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Puts an enemy target on trial - Punishment deals Attack x 220-300% damage OR commendation heals Attack x 50%.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Enemies are severely punished, increasing their damage taken by 10-30% for 3s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Transforms troops into a relentless sword of justice, granting a 20% chance of increasing damage dealt by 8-40% for all troops for 3 turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Uses the authority of the law to intimidate enemies, granting all troops' attack a 20% chance of reducing damage dealt by 10-50% for all enemy troops for 2 turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Increases Health by 5-25% for all troops through Greg's faith in law and order.

heroes.name: Ahmose
heroes.notes: Frontline tank with invulnerability and infantry damage boost. Prayer of Flame gives 100% infantry damage at max.
heroes.best_use: Strong defensive infantry. Cthugha's Protection gives invulnerability. Viper Formation reduces damage taken by Lancers/Marksmen. Good tank for exploration.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Ahmose enters an invulnerable state (unable to move/cast, immune to control) and reduces damage taken by 30-70% for nearby friendly troops for 2s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Ahmose pierces enemies with a sharp spear, dealing Attack x 70-98% damage and making enemies take 20% more damage for 2s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: After casting Cthugha's Protection, Ahmose recovers Attack x 30-42% Health for 5s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Infantry pauses attack once every 4 times, reducing Lancer/Marksman damage taken by 10-30% and Infantry damage taken by 10-70% for 2 turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Amplifies Infantry damage dealt by 20-100% with the power of Fire Crystal.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Infuses Infantry weapons with Fire Crystals, increasing damage per attack by 12-60% and target damage taken by 5-25% for 1 turn.

heroes.name: Reina
heroes.notes: Silent assassin with AoE damage and dodge. Phantom Assault deals massive area damage from behind.
heroes.best_use: Great assassin kit for Exploration. Phantom Assault deals 300-420% AoE. Assassin's Instinct boosts normal attack damage by 30% for all troops.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Reina inflicts Illusion on enemy targets (heroes first), dealing Attack x 100-140% damage and immobilizing them for 1.5s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: 5-25% chance of confusing the opponent with Illusion and dodging damage when receiving a Normal Attack.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Reina conjures an illusion to ambush enemies from behind, dealing Attack x 300-420% AoE Damage.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Reina targets enemy weak spots, increasing normal attack damage by 10-30% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Reina's adept leadership grants all troops a 4-20% chance of dodging normal attacks.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Lancers have a 25% chance of performing an extra attack, dealing 120-200% damage.

heroes.name: Lynn
heroes.notes: Support marksman with debuff cleanse and healing reduction. Hymn of Sidrak clears all debuffs and grants immunity.
heroes.best_use: Best defensive Marksman. Hymn of Sidrak clears and prevents debuffs. Song of Lion gives 50% damage boost chance. Nice debuff/control clearing.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Clears all debuffs for all troops and increases Attack by 3-7% for 3-5s, granting immunity to debuffs.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Fires a penetrating bullet dealing Attack x 220-300% damage to enemies along the way.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Reduces enemy Attack Speed by 1-3% and Healing effects by 40-60% for all enemy troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: 40% chance of increasing damage dealt by 10-50% for all friendly troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Reduces damage dealt by enemy troops by 4-20%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Increases Marksmen's attack by 1-5% for every 3 attacks, stackable until battle end.

heroes.name: Hector
heroes.notes: Combat infantry with control immunity and damage boost when low health. Shines in Expedition.
heroes.best_use: Excellent for rallies. Sword Whirlwind grants CC immunity for 4s. Warrior's Endurance gives 60% damage reduction and 48% ATK under 50% HP. Strong Infantry/Marksmen damage buffs.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Unleashes a whirlwind of swordplay, increasing Attack Speed by 80-120% and becoming immune to Freeze, Stun and control effects for 4s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Thrives with danger, reducing Damage Taken by 20-60% under 50% health.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Gains +16-48% Attack under 50% Health.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: 40% chance of reducing damage taken by 10-50% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Increases Infantry Damage Dealt by 100-200% and Marksman Damage by 20-100% for 10 attacks with diminishing returns.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Grants a 25% chance of dealing 120-200% damage on attack.

heroes.name: Norah
heroes.notes: Top tier rally joiner. Sneak Strike boosts Lancer damage dramatically.
heroes.best_use: TOP TIER RALLY JOINER. Sneak Strike +100% extra damage. Combined Arms buffs Infantry/Marksmen. Priority SvS hero.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Unleashes a 5-grenade cascade against random targets (heroes first), dealing Attack x 60-84% AoE damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Throws a flashbang dealing Attack x 50-70% damage and stuns the target for 1.5s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Blitzes the enemy, boosting all Troops Attack by 3-5%.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Decreases Damage Taken by 3-15% and boosts Damage Dealt by 3-15% for Infantry and Marksman.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: 20% chance of dealing 20-100% extra damage to all enemies on attack. Best rally joiner skill.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Increases all troops' Damage Dealt by 5-25% and reduces damage taken by 5-25% every 5 Lancer attacks for 2 turns.

heroes.name: Gwen
heroes.notes: First Marksman to target backline directly. Massive burst damage with 50% chance to double. Best offensive Marksman of Gen 5.
heroes.best_use: Best offensive Marksman for Exploration. Targets enemy backline heroes/damage dealers. Eagle Vision increases target damage taken by 25%. Amazing burst potential.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Gwen targets enemy backline with precision strikes, dealing massive damage to damage dealers and supports.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Throws an incendiary grenade dealing AoE damage and leaving burning ground.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Gwen's aerial tactics grant attack bonuses and evasion chances.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Marks targets, increasing their damage taken by up to 25% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Increases Marksmen damage and provides team-wide combat buffs.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Periodic AoE bombardment dealing damage to all enemies.

heroes.name: Jessie
heroes.notes: BEST attack rally joiner in the game. Her Stand of Arms skill (+25% DMG dealt) affects ALL damage types.
heroes.best_use: BEST ATTACK JOINER. Put in leftmost slot when joining attack rallies or Bear Trap. Her +25% damage buff applies to all troops.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Jessie sprays enemies in a forward arc with her machine gun, dealing Attack x 55-75% damage every 0.5s for 2s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Jessie upgrades her armor, increasing Defense by 25-70%.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Jessie's upgraded weapon boosts Attack by 8-24%.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Jessie implements advanced weaponry for our troops, increasing damage dealt by 5-25% for ALL troops. Best attack joiner skill in the game.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: With a keen engineering eye, Jessie enhances troops armor, reducing damage taken by 4-20% for all troops.
heroes.rally_joiner_skill: +25% DMG dealt (all troops) - affects normal attacks, hero skills, pet abilities

heroes.name: Wu Ming
heroes.notes: Top tier hero. Cyclone Barrier, Shadow Evasion. Excels in all game modes.
heroes.best_use: TOP 3 HERO IN GAME. Excels everywhere - SvS, rallies, exploration. Priority investment. Pairs with Jeronimo for unstoppable front line.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Wu Ming twirls his staff forming an unyielding barrier, dealing Attack x 100-140% AoE damage and gaining invulnerability for 2s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Wu Ming finds clarity, increasing Attack by 8-24% and Defense by 16-48% for 4s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Deals Attack x 20-28% damage to a random enemy with every normal attack.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Reduces troops' damage taken from normal attacks by 5-25% and from skills by 6-30%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Spreads wisdom and techniques, increasing friendly troops' damage dealt by 4-20%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Leads everyone to heightened affinity, increasing troops' skill damage dealt by 5-25%.

heroes.name: Renee
heroes.notes: Powerhouse with invulnerability, area damage, and damage reduction.
heroes.best_use: Excellent lancer with survivability. Great for SvS and rallies. Strong investment alongside Gordon.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Renee's colorful ball explodes releasing a strange cloud, dealing Attack x 100-140% AoE damage and confusing enemies for 1s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Splashes dreamy paint dealing Attack x 50-70% damage and placing Star Mark increasing target's damage taken by 2-6% for 4s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Star Marked targets cannot escape detection, increasing Attack by 8-24% and damage to marked targets by 4-12%.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Troops place Dream Marks on targets every 2 turns, dealing extra 40-200% Lancer Damage next turn.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Dream Marks highlight vulnerabilities, increasing troop damage to marked targets by 30-150%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Dream Marks expose weaknesses, increasing damage dealt to marked targets by 15-75% for all troops.

heroes.name: Wayne
heroes.notes: Solid marksman for Gen 6.
heroes.best_use: Good marksman option. Consider waiting for Blanchette if server age is close.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Wayne throws a boomerang dealing Attack x 100-140% AoE damage in a straight line with return damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Each normal attack has a 15-35% chance of triggering another normal attack.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Wayne's impeccable aim grants a 3-15% Crit Rate on dealing damage.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: All troops launch an extra attack every 4 turns, dealing 20-100% damage.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: On every other attack, Marksmen deal 8-40% extra damage to enemy Lancers and 4-20% extra to enemy Marksmen.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Grants all troops' attacks a 5-25% Crit Rate.

heroes.name: Gordon
heroes.notes: Top tier for Bear Hunt and rallies. Poison toolkit amplifies Lancer damage.
heroes.best_use: BEST LANCER FOR RALLIES. Poison amplifies all lancer damage. Essential for Bear Hunt. Priority investment.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Throws a vase that disintegrates into toxic mist, dealing Attack x 50-70% damage every 0.5s for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Hurls a chemical flask poisoning the target, dealing Attack x 25-35% damage every 0.5s and increasing Damage Taken by 5-25% for 2s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Gordon's body has adapted to toxins, increasing his Defense by 25-75%.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Dips Lancer weapons in venom. Every 2 attacks, Lancers deal 20-100% extra damage and apply poison for 1 turn.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Envenomed weapons increase Lancer Damage by 30-150% and reduce enemy Damage by 6-30% for 1 turn every 3 turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Generates bio-toxic fog confusing enemy Infantry, increasing their Damage Taken by 6-30%.

heroes.name: Edith
heroes.notes: Mech pilot with Mr. Tin robot. Amazing rally joiner with troop buffs and shielding damage.
heroes.best_use: EXCELLENT RALLY JOINER. Strategic Balance buffs Marksmen defense and Lancer damage. Steel Sentinel gives +25% Health to all troops. Crazy battlefield presence.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Mr. Tin punches all enemies in a fan-shaped area dealing Attack x 100-140% damage, stunning for 1s and boosting Mr. Tin's Attack by 20-100% for 2s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: At 0 health, Mr. Tin ejects Edith in an escape capsule and detonates, dealing Attack x 200-280% damage to nearby enemies.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Battlefield intel warns Mr. Tin of dangers, providing 10-50% chance to reduce incoming damage by 50%.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Mr. Tin's presence shields ranged units, reducing Marksmen damage by 4-20% while increasing Lancer damage by 4-20%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Mr. Tin's metallic body reduces Infantry damage taken by 4-20%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Mobile defense system increases Health by 5-25% for all troops.

heroes.name: Bradley
heroes.notes: Artillery marksman with powerful AoE. Destructor deals 420% AoE damage. Key for Gen 7 Bear Hunt scores.
heroes.best_use: TOP PVE MARKSMAN. Destructor and Incendiary Shell clear waves fast. Veteran's Might gives 30% damage buff to all troops. Bear Hunt scores increase dramatically.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Deals Attack x 300-420% AoE Damage with artillery primer.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Fires a shell dealing Attack x 60-84% AoE Damage, leaving a flaming crater that inflicts additional damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Boosts Attack power by 10-26%.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Increases Attack by 5-25% for all troops through combat expertise.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Increases damage vs Lancers by 6-30% and vs Infantry by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Delivers periodic offense boosts of 6-30% for all troops for 2 turns every 4 turns.

heroes.name: Gatot
heroes.notes: Heir of kings with shield and intimidation. Really hard to kill. Excels in defensive modes.
heroes.best_use: BEST DEFENSIVE INFANTRY. King's Resolve grants shield and reflects 30% damage. War Dance gives dodge chance and crit rate. Excellent for garrison defense.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Activates a shield of Resolve providing Shield protection equal to Attack x 220-380% for 5 seconds.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Regal presence intimidates enemy heroes, reducing their Attack by 1-5% and increasing own Attack by 1-5% per intimidated hero for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Grants 3-15% chance of dodging Normal Attacks and 4-20% Crit Rate.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Increases Infantry Defense by 6-30%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Great kings bless Infantry, granting them Shield equal to Attack x 6-30% each time they attack for 1 turn.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Formidable forces reduce enemy Attack by 5-25%.

heroes.name: Hendrik
heroes.notes: Naval captain with abyssal spirits. Worm's Ravage reduces enemy defense by 25%. Top-tier rally support.
heroes.best_use: TOP RALLY SUPPORT. Worm's Ravage reduces ALL enemy defense by 25% - massive damage amplification. Armor of Barnacles gives 30% defense buff. Dragon's Heir deals periodic AoE.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Summons ancient spirits from the dark abyss, dealing Attack x 220-300% damage to targets within range and stunning them for 1.5s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Hurls a heavy anchor with unbelievable strength, dealing Attack x 100-140% damage to enemies within range.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Harnesses power from others, dealing 0.5-2.5% more damage with each defeated enemy (max 15 stacks).
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Commands a giant naval shipworm to gnaw at enemy armor, reducing ALL enemy troops' Defense by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Covers all friendly Troops with hard-shelled barnacles every 4 turns, increasing Defense by 6-30% for 2 turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Every 3 turns, abyssal spirit descendants attack with Marksmen, dealing 8-40% damage to all enemies.

heroes.name: Sonya
heroes.notes: Fallen Queen with ice attacks. Extreme Cold freezes and deals AoE damage. Strong even in Gen 9.
heroes.best_use: EXCELLENT CONTROL LANCER. Extreme Cold freezes targets for 1.5s with AoE. Treasure Hunter gives 20% damage to all troops. Bounty Temptation boosts Lancer damage 75%.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Shoots jets of cryogen, freezing a target for 1.5s and dealing Attack x 220-300% AoE Damage to target and nearby enemies.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Fires a frozen bomb dealing Attack x 100-140% damage to an enemy and reducing Attack Speed of nearby enemies by 50% for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Burning desire for bounty increases Attack by 10-30%.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Sonya's promise inspires everyone, increasing Damage by 4-20% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Lancers deal 15-75% additional damage every 2 attacks and boost all troop attack by 5-25% for one turn.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Lancers deal 50-250% damage every 5 turns and stun the target for 1 turn.

heroes.name: Magnus
heroes.notes: Wild infantry with twin axes. Absolutely wild damage, buffs, and debuffs that scale into late game.
heroes.best_use: TOP TIER INFANTRY. S+ for Gen 9+. Frozen Fury taunts and deals continuous damage. Sunderer reduces enemy defense 25%. Tundra's Might reduces damage taken 15%.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Magnus roars with fury, taunting all enemies to attack him while dealing Attack x 50-70% damage continuously for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Throws a spinning tomahawk dealing Attack x 150-210% damage to enemies in its path.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Magnus's brutal strikes reduce enemy Defense by 5-25% for 3s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Wild hunger increases Infantry Damage Dealt by 20-100%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Infantry gain Shield equal to 6-30% of Attack every 3 turns for 1 turn.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Tundra's hardened warriors reduce Infantry Damage Taken by 3-15%.

heroes.name: Fred
heroes.notes: Fire lancer with shield and burn effects. Nice shield buffing and debuffing kit. Best in Arena and Expedition.
heroes.best_use: Good support lancer. Blazing Charge stuns for 1.5s. Inferno Shield protects weakest ally. Acid Rain increases target damage taken by 15%.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Fred charges forward engulfed in flames, dealing Attack x 200-280% damage and stunning enemies for 1.5s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Creates a flame barrier around the weakest ally, absorbing Attack x 100-140% damage for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Normal attacks have a 10-30% chance to deal additional fire damage equal to Attack x 50%.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Corrosive downpour increases target damage taken by 3-15% for all enemy troops for 2 turns every 4 turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Lancers deal 20-100% extra damage every 3 turns and reduce enemy Attack by 5-25% for 1 turn.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Burns the battlefield, dealing 10-50% damage to all enemies every 3 turns.

heroes.name: Xura
heroes.how_to_obtain: King of Icefield, State of Power, Foundry Shop, Daily Deals
heroes.notes: Enigmatic marksman with healing dance and high burst. Crit-focused for massive damage.
heroes.best_use: TOP RALLY LEADER. Divine Dance heals all heroes and reduces damage taken 50%. Storm Sniper boosts Marksmen damage 100%. F2P friendly via Foundry Shop.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Xura performs a sacred dance, healing all heroes for Attack x 150-210% and reducing damage taken by 10-50% for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Fires a volley of wind-infused arrows dealing Attack x 200-280% AoE damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Marks targets with tempest sigils, increasing damage they take by 5-15% for 4s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Infected spores reduce all enemy troops' Attack by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Protective spores reduce all friendly troops' Damage Taken by 4-20%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Wind-guided shots increase Marksmen Damage Dealt by 20-100%.

heroes.name: Blanchette
heroes.notes: Best damage dealer in the game. High base stats, accurate attacks. F2P friendly.
heroes.best_use: BEST MARKSMAN IN GAME. Highest damage output, excellent in all modes. F2P friendly unlock. Priority investment once available.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Fires three powerful blasts dealing Attack x 100-140% damage each to enemies in a cone.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Rapid-fire scatter attack dealing Attack x 50-70% damage to multiple targets 5 times.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Targets low-health enemies, dealing 10-30% bonus damage to enemies below 50% health.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Advanced armaments increase Marksmen Damage Dealt by 20-100%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Relentless pursuit grants 5-25% bonus damage vs wounded targets for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Precision shooting increases all troops' Crit Rate by 4-20% and Crit Damage by 10-50%.

heroes.name: Gregory
heroes.notes: Legion of the Sun guardian. Even in death, his example buffs allies. Infantry damage reduction.
heroes.best_use: Solid infantry with Sacrificial Will that buffs all troops after defeat. Parryshield gives 50% damage reduction chance. Reduces Infantry damage taken 20%.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Gregory slams his sword down creating a shockwave, dealing Attack x 200-280% AoE damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Defensive stance grants 10-50% chance to reduce incoming damage by 50% for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Upon defeat, Gregory's sacrifice inspires all allies, increasing their Attack by 10-30% for 5s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Infantry uncover hidden potential, increasing Damage Dealt by 10-50% every 4 turns for 2 turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Gregory's courage inspires, increasing all troops' Attack by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Fortified positions reduce Infantry Damage Taken by 4-20%.

heroes.name: Freya
heroes.notes: Night's Vengeance with chains. High burst damage and enemy control. Chain mark spreads damage.
heroes.best_use: TOP EXPLORATION LANCER. Chain Sunder marks targets - attacks spread damage to nearby enemies. Night's Vengeance reduces damage taken 15% and boosts damage dealt 15% for Infantry/Marksmen.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Freya lashes enemies with chains, dealing Attack x 180-252% damage and marking targets - damage spreads to nearby enemies.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Sweeping scythe attack deals Attack x 220-300% AoE damage under the blood moon's power.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Fury crystallizes into power, increasing Attack by 10-30% and Attack Speed by 10-30% for 4s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Dark power reduces Infantry and Marksmen Damage Taken by 3-15% and increases their Damage Dealt by 3-15%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Marked enemies take 20-100% extra damage from Lancers and spread 10-50% damage to nearby enemies.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Moon's blessing increases all troops' Damage Dealt by 5-25%.

heroes.name: Eleonora
heroes.how_to_obtain: Lucky Wheel, Mythic General Hero Shard, Foundry Shop
heroes.notes: Royal infantry with blazing shield. Reflects 30% damage while shielded. Defense reduction on targets.
heroes.best_use: Tank with Shield of Blaze that reflects 30% damage. Heavy Hammer Strike reduces target defense 30%. Majestic Corona boosts troop health.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Raises a blazing shield absorbing Attack x 200-280% damage and reflecting 10-30% damage back for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Devastating hammer blow deals Attack x 250-350% damage and reduces target Defense by 10-30% for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Royal authority increases Attack by 5-15% and reduces damage taken by 5-15% for 4s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Royal blessing increases all troops' Health by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Blazing light deals 10-50% damage to all enemies every 4 turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Inspires Infantry, increasing their Damage Dealt by 20-100%.

heroes.name: Lloyd
heroes.how_to_obtain: Hall of Chiefs, King of Icefield, State of Power, Daily Deals, Hero Rally, Foundry Shop
heroes.notes: Craftsman lancer with mechanical cuckoos and bombs. Lethality support for burst tactics.
heroes.best_use: LETHALITY SPECIALIST. Iceflare Bomb gives Lancers 150% attack boost every 3 turns. Bird Invasion reduces enemy Lethality 20%. Ingenious Mastery boosts all troops Lethality 50%.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Lloyd deploys mechanical cuckoos that bombard enemies, dealing Attack x 60-84% damage 5 times.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Master craftsmanship increases Attack by 10-30% and Crit Rate by 5-15%.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Analyzes enemy weak points, increasing damage by 5-15% against targets below 50% health.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Mechanical birds harass enemies, reducing enemy Lethality by 4-20%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Powerful explosives boost Lancer Attack by 30-150% every 3 turns for 1 turn.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Ingenious engineering increases all troops' Lethality by 10-50%.

heroes.name: Rufus
heroes.how_to_obtain: Hall of Heroes, Mythic General Hero Shard, Foundry Shop
heroes.notes: Rebel mercenary with explosive grenades and burn effects. Battlefield disruptor and damage amplifier.
heroes.best_use: TOP AOE MARKSMAN. Starfall Impact deals 280% AoE + burn. Armor Crush boosts Infantry damage 60% and increases target damage taken 25%. Wrathful Quake reduces enemy Lethality 50%.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Rufus calls down a meteor strike dealing Attack x 200-280% AoE damage and burning targets for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Explosive fragmentation deals Attack x 100-140% damage to target and Attack x 50-70% to nearby enemies.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Incendiary rounds add 10-30% burn damage to normal attacks.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Armor-piercing rounds boost Infantry Damage by 12-60% and increase target damage taken by 5-25% for 2 turns every 4 turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Earthquake bombs reduce enemy Lethality by 10-50%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Blazing morale increases Marksmen Damage Dealt by 20-100%.

heroes.name: Hervor
heroes.how_to_obtain: Hall of Heroes, Mythic General Hero Shard, Foundry Shop
heroes.notes: Chieftain of Sathla with hammer strikes and intimidation. CC immunity and massive infantry damage reduction.
heroes.best_use: TOP TIER INFANTRY. Earthmover stuns and intimidates. Stone Arms gives CC immunity and 25% damage reduction. Battlethirsty reduces Infantry damage taken AND boosts their damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Hervor slams the ground with tremendous force, dealing Attack x 250-350% AoE damage and stunning enemies for 1.5s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Mountainous physique increases Defense by 15-45% and Health by 10-30%.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Hervor's arms become stone, granting immunity to Stun and Freeze and reducing damage taken by 5-25% for 4s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: War cry increases all troops' Damage Dealt by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Unbreakable spirit reduces Infantry Damage Taken by 6-30%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Battle hunger increases Infantry Damage Dealt by 20-100% and reduces their Damage Taken by 4-20%.

heroes.name: Karol
heroes.how_to_obtain: Lucky Wheel, Mythic General Hero Shard, Foundry Shop
heroes.notes: Eagle Brigade cavalry commander. Dawn Charge with attack buffs. Anti-Lancer/Infantry specialist.
heroes.best_use: TOP OFFENSIVE LANCER. Shieldbreaker boosts damage vs Lancers 30% and Infantry 25%. In the Wings reduces all troops damage taken 20%. Triumphant March buffs Rally Squad Attack.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Karol leads a dawn cavalry charge, dealing Attack x 220-300% damage and increasing Attack by 10-30% for 4s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Spear strike deals Attack x 150-210% damage and reduces enemy Defense by 10-30% for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Each kill increases Attack by 2-6% (stacks up to 10 times).
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Strategic positioning reduces all troops' Damage Taken by 4-20%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Armor-piercing tactics increase damage vs Lancers by 6-30% and vs Infantry by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Ancient battle standard increases all troops' Attack by 5-25%.

heroes.name: Ligeia
heroes.how_to_obtain: Hall of Chiefs, King of Icefield, State of Power, Daily Deals, Hero Rally, Foundry Shop
heroes.notes: Mech-spider queen with summons and damage reflection. Best DPS marksman of Gen 12. Status deflection.
heroes.best_use: BEST GEN 12 DPS. Mech-Spiders Attack reduces enemy attack 25%. Steelweb creates resonance trap reflecting damage. Marksmen Spider Support gives 100% extra damage every 2 attacks.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Deploys mech-spiders that attack enemies, dealing Attack x 60-84% damage 5 times and reducing target Attack by 5-25%.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Creates a steel web trap that immobilizes enemies for 1.5s and reflects 10-30% damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Activates defensive protocol, reducing damage taken by 10-30% and increasing Attack Speed by 10-30% for 4s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Spider drones assist Marksmen, dealing 20-100% extra damage every 2 attacks.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Venomous arrows increase target damage taken by 5-25% for 2 turns every 3 turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Corrosive venom reduces all enemy troops' Defense by 5-25%.

heroes.name: Gisela
heroes.how_to_obtain: Hall of Chiefs, King of Icefield, State of Power, Daily Deals, Hero Rally, Foundry Shop
heroes.notes: Mechanical genius with mech-arms and energy shield system. Attack speed and defense buffs.
heroes.best_use: Defensive infantry with energy-based shield. Superload gives 60% attack speed and 150% defense. Mini-Shield activates at 100 energy for 190% protection.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Gisela overcharges her mech-arms, increasing Attack Speed by 20-60% and Defense by 50-150% for 4s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Powerful mechanical fist strike deals Attack x 200-280% damage and stuns for 1s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: At 100 energy, deploys a shield absorbing Attack x 70-190% damage for 3s.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Salvaged parts increase Infantry Defense by 6-30%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Power generators boost all troops' Attack by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Automated defenses deal 10-50% damage to enemies every 3 turns.

heroes.name: Flora
heroes.how_to_obtain: Hall of Heroes, Mythic General Hero Shard, Foundry Shop
heroes.notes: Botanist summoner with vines, toxic blooms, and plant summons. Excellent CC with 2s stuns.
heroes.best_use: TOP EXPLORATION LANCER. Envelopment stuns for 2s with AoE. Rosebloom spawns flesh-eating Adoria Rose vs heroes. Enmiring Vines gives 50% chance to increase enemy damage taken 50%.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Flora summons entangling vines dealing Attack x 180-252% AoE damage and stunning enemies for 2s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Spawns a carnivorous Adoria Rose that targets enemy heroes, dealing Attack x 100-140% damage every 1s for 5s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Drawing power from nature increases Attack by 10-30% and Health regen by 1-3% per second.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Grasping vines grant a 10-50% chance to increase enemy damage taken by 10-50%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Living plants heal friendly troops for 5-25% of max Health every 4 turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Hallucinogenic spores reduce enemy Attack by 5-25%.

heroes.name: Vulcanus
heroes.how_to_obtain: Lucky Wheel, Mythic General Hero Shard, Foundry Shop
heroes.notes: Undercity hunter with chained darts and terror tactics. Bleed on all damage. Massive rally buffs.
heroes.best_use: TOP RALLY MARKSMAN. All attacks cause Bleed. Arrowheads reduce enemy Infantry/Lancer defense 60% and boost Marksmen attack 60%. +15% target damage taken amplification.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Throws a chained dart dealing Attack x 180-252% damage and pulling target closer, applying Bleed for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Channels fury into focus, increasing Crit Rate by 10-30% and Crit Damage by 20-60% for 4s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Intimidation reduces enemy Attack by 5-15% and increases their damage taken by 5-15%.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Superior weaponry increases Marksmen Attack by 12-60% and reduces Infantry/Lancer Defense by 12-60%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Armor-piercing rounds increase all troops' damage vs high-defense targets by 10-50%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: All attacks cause Bleed, dealing 2-10% extra damage per turn for 2 turns.

heroes.name: Elif
heroes.how_to_obtain: Lucky Wheel, Mythic General Hero Shard, Foundry Shop
heroes.notes: Ethereal dancer with high evasion and confusion. Dazzling moves grant 30% dodge. Infantry shields.
heroes.best_use: TOP EVASION TANK. Spectral Glide confuses enemies and grants 30% dodge. Shackling Veil reduces all enemy attack 25%. Enchanting Tapestry gives Infantry shields equal to 30% Attack.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Elif glides through enemies like a phantom, dealing Attack x 150-210% damage and gaining 10-30% dodge chance for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: A mesmerizing dance of blades deals Attack x 200-280% AoE damage and confuses enemies for 1.5s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Ghostly movements grant 5-15% permanent dodge chance and 5-15% Attack Speed.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Ethereal veils reduce all enemy troops' Attack by 5-25%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Coordinated blade work increases Infantry Damage Dealt by 20-100%.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Woven enchantments grant Infantry Shield equal to 6-30% of Attack every 3 turns.

heroes.name: Dominic
heroes.how_to_obtain: Hall of Chiefs, King of Icefield, State of Power, Daily Deals, Hero Rally, Foundry Shop
heroes.notes: Magician with box tricks, fire roses, and unique revival. One-time resurrection when defeated.
heroes.best_use: UNIQUE REVIVAL. Double Trouble revives Dominic once per battle with restored health. Box Trick stuns with AoE. Mirror Maze reduces Infantry/Marksmen damage taken and boosts their damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Dominic traps enemies in a magic box, dealing Attack x 200-280% AoE damage and stunning for 1.5s.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Conjures flaming roses dealing Attack x 60-84% damage to nearby enemies every 0.5s for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: Upon defeat, Dominic reappears with 30-50% Health restored. Triggers once per battle.
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Magical contraptions increase Lancer Damage Dealt by 20-100%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Hidden spikes deal 10-50% damage to enemies every 3 turns.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Illusions reduce Infantry and Marksmen Damage Taken by 3-15% and boost their Damage Dealt by 3-15%.

heroes.name: Cara
heroes.how_to_obtain: Hall of Heroes, Mythic General Hero Shard, Foundry Shop
heroes.notes: Steam-powered marksman with cannon and gas attacks. Attack buff when allies fall. Accuracy debuffs.
heroes.best_use: TOP AoE MARKSMAN. Arcane Blast deals 280% AoE. Gloomy Mist reduces enemy accuracy and burns. Heartfelt Friendship boosts attack when allies defeated. Mech Pet gives 30% normal attack damage to all troops.
heroes.exploration_skill_1_desc: Cara fires a powerful arcane cannon blast dealing Attack x 200-280% AoE damage.
heroes.exploration_skill_2_desc: Releases toxic gas reducing enemy accuracy by 10-30% and dealing burn damage for 3s.
heroes.exploration_skill_3_desc: When allies fall, Cara's Attack increases by 5-15% per defeated ally (stacks up to 4 times).
heroes.expedition_skill_1_desc: Smoke screens reduce enemy Crit Rate by 4-20%.
heroes.expedition_skill_2_desc: Mechanical companion increases normal attack damage by 6-30% for all troops.
heroes.expedition_skill_3_desc: Dark fury increases Marksmen Damage Dealt by 20-100%.

tier_descriptions.S+: Meta-defining. Stays relevant across many generations. Always worth max investment. Examples: Jeronimo, Wu Ming, Blanchette.
tier_descriptions.S: Excellent heroes that define their role. High priority investment. May be slightly outclassed by S+ in same role.
tier_descriptions.A: Great heroes for their generation. Good investment, but may be replaced by higher tier heroes later.
tier_descriptions.B: Good heroes. Use if you don't have better options. Limited investment recommended.
tier_descriptions.C: Average. Replace when possible. Minimal investment.
tier_descriptions.D: Poor. Avoid investing resources. Use only as absolute last resort.

Infantry.description: Frontline tanks. High defense and health.

Lancer.description: Balanced fighters. Good damage and mobility.
